short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just another find and replace: Algorithm to Wizard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It takes the word "algorithm" and replaces it with the word "wizard."
